# Earthquakes Tutorial: updated version

* The tutorial was still using `model.Component`, which got changed into `state.Provider`
* Details: https://github.com/neomjs/neo/issues/6607
* I also updated the related `createAppMinimal` program

All changes in one commit: https://github.com/neomjs/neo/commit/637380fa1ec4af1c4182f8e1741ed57465adff27
